column2: an A.M. Eatery////Strike #1: The hostess with the long pony tail was extremely snotty when I asked her how many tables were in front of me. She pointed out that I have only been waiting about 10 out of the quoted 45 minutes. Thanks captain obvious
column3: but that's not what I asked. After waiting more than an hour
column4: I came back up to check on the status and they had obviously skipped over us. Instead of a simple answer like she gave the guy in front of me
column5: she had me spell out my name and confirm my phone number. Then told me she would seat us as soon as they cleaned a couple of tables. At this point we had waited approximately 70 minutes. Arrived at 12:50pm and got seated at 2:00pm.
